text.ascii: lomaza uvAca
text.ur: lomaśa uvāca

text.ascii: samudraM sa samAsAdya vAruNir bhagavAn RSiH
text.ur: samudraṁ sa samāsādya vāruṇir bhagavān r̥ṣiḥ

text.ascii: uvAca sahitAn devAn RSIMz caiva samAgatAn
text.ur: uvāca sahitān devān r̥ṣīṁś caiva samāgatān

text.ascii: eSa lokahitArthaM vai pibAmi varuNAlayam
text.ur: eṣa lokahitārthaṁ vai pibāmi varuṇālayam

text.ascii: bhavadbhir yad anuSTheyaM tac chIghraM saMvidhIyatAm
text.ur: bhavadbhir yad anuṣṭheyaṁ tac chīghraṁ saṁvidhīyatām

text.ascii: etAvad uktvA vacanaM maitrAvaruNir acyutaH
text.ur: etāvad uktvā vacanaṁ maitrāvaruṇir acyutaḥ

text.ascii: samudram apibat kruddhaH sarvalokasya pazyataH
text.ur: samudram apibat kruddhaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ

text.ascii: pIyamAnaM samudraM tu dRSTvA devAH savAsavAH
text.ud: पीयमानं समुद्रं तु दृष्ट्वा देवाः सवासवाः
text.ur: pīyamānaṁ samudraṁ tu dr̥ṣṭvā devāḥ savāsavāḥ

text.ascii: vismayaM paramaM jagmuH stutibhiz cApy apUjayan
text.ur: vismayaṁ paramaṁ jagmuḥ stutibhiś cāpy apūjayan

text.ascii: tvaM nas trAtA vidhAtA ca lokAnAM lokabhAvanaH
text.ud: त्वं नस्त्राता विधाता च लोकानां लोकभावनः
text.ur: tvaṁ nas trātā vidhātā ca lokānāṁ lokabhāvanaḥ

text.ascii: tvatprasAdAt samucchedaM na gacchet sAmaraM jagat
text.ur: tvatprasādāt samucchedaṁ na gacchet sāmaraṁ jagat

text.ascii: saMpUjyamAnas tridazair mahAtmA; gandharvatUryeSu nadatsu sarvazaH
text.ur: saṁpūjyamānas tridaśair mahātmā; gandharvatūryeṣu nadatsu sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: divyaiz ca puSpair avakIryamANo; mahArNavaM niHsalilaM cakAra
text.ur: divyaiś ca puṣpair avakīryamāṇo; mahārṇavaṁ niḥsalilaṁ cakāra

text.ascii: dRSTvA kRtaM niHsalilaM mahArNavaM; surAH samastAH paramaprahRSTAH
text.ud: दृष्ट्वा कृतं निःसलिलं महार्णवं; सुराः समस्ताः परमप्रहृष्टाः
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvā kr̥taṁ niḥsalilaṁ mahārṇavaṁ; surāḥ samastāḥ paramaprahr̥ṣṭāḥ

text.ascii: pragRhya divyAni varAyudhAni; tAn dAnavAJ jaghnur adInasattvAH
text.ur: pragr̥hya divyāni varāyudhāni; tān dānavāñ jaghnur adīnasattvāḥ

text.ascii: te vadhyamAnAs tridazair mahAtmabhir; mahAbalair vegibhir unnadadbhiH
text.ur: te vadhyamānās tridaśair mahātmabhir; mahābalair vegibhir unnadadbhiḥ

text.ascii: na sehire vegavatAM mahAtmanAM; vegaM tadA dhArayituM divaukasAm
text.ud: न सेहिरे वेगवतां महात्मनां; वेगं तदा धारयितुं दिवौकसाम्
text.ur: na sehire vegavatāṁ mahātmanāṁ; vegaṁ tadā dhārayituṁ divaukasām

text.ascii: te vadhyamAnAs tridazair dAnavA bhImanisvanAH
text.ur: te vadhyamānās tridaśair dānavā bhīmanisvanāḥ

text.ascii: cakruH sutumulaM yuddhaM muhUrtam iva bhArata
text.ur: cakruḥ sutumulaṁ yuddhaṁ muhūrtam iva bhārata

text.ascii: te pUrvaM tapasA dagdhA munibhir bhAvitAtmabhiH
text.ur: te pūrvaṁ tapasā dagdhā munibhir bhāvitātmabhiḥ

text.ascii: yatamAnAH paraM zaktyA tridazair viniSUditAH
text.ur: yatamānāḥ paraṁ śaktyā tridaśair viniṣūditāḥ

text.ascii: te hemaniSkAbharaNAH kuNDalAGgadadhAriNaH
text.ur: te hemaniṣkābharaṇāḥ kuṇḍalāṅgadadhāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: nihatya bahv azobhanta puSpitA iva kiMzukAH
text.ur: nihatya bahv aśobhanta puṣpitā iva kiṁśukāḥ

text.ascii: hatazeSAs tataH ke cit kAleyA manujottama
text.ur: hataśeṣās tataḥ ke cit kāleyā manujottama

text.ascii: vidArya vasudhAM devIM pAtAlatalam AzritAH
text.ur: vidārya vasudhāṁ devīṁ pātālatalam āśritāḥ

text.ascii: nihatAn dAnavAn dRSTvA tridazA munipuMgavam
text.ur: nihatān dānavān dr̥ṣṭvā tridaśā munipuṁgavam

text.ascii: tuSTuvur vividhair vAkyair idaM caivAbruvan vacaH
text.ur: tuṣṭuvur vividhair vākyair idaṁ caivābruvan vacaḥ

text.ascii: tvatprasAdAn mahAbhAga lokaiH prAptaM mahat sukham
text.ur: tvatprasādān mahābhāga lokaiḥ prāptaṁ mahat sukham

text.ascii: tvattejasA ca nihatAH kAleyAH krUravikramAH
text.ur: tvattejasā ca nihatāḥ kāleyāḥ krūravikramāḥ

text.ascii: pUrayasva mahAbAho samudraM lokabhAvana
text.ur: pūrayasva mahābāho samudraṁ lokabhāvana

text.ascii: yat tvayA salilaM pItaM tad asmin punar utsRja
text.ur: yat tvayā salilaṁ pītaṁ tad asmin punar utsr̥ja

text.ascii: evam uktaH pratyuvAca bhagavAn munipuMgavaH
text.ur: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca bhagavān munipuṁgavaḥ

text.ascii: jIrNaM tad dhi mayA toyam upAyo 'nyaH pracintyatAm
text.ur: jīrṇaṁ tad dhi mayā toyam upāyo ’nyaḥ pracintyatām

text.ascii: pUraNArthaM samudrasya bhavadbhir yatnam AsthitaiH
text.ur: pūraṇārthaṁ samudrasya bhavadbhir yatnam āsthitaiḥ

text.ascii: etac chrutvA tu vacanaM maharSer bhAvitAtmanaH
text.ur: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṁ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ

text.ascii: vismitAz ca viSaNNAz ca babhUvuH sahitAH surAH
text.ur: vismitāś ca viṣaṇṇāś ca babhūvuḥ sahitāḥ surāḥ

text.ascii: parasparam anujJApya praNamya munipuMgavam
text.ur: parasparam anujñāpya praṇamya munipuṁgavam

text.ascii: prajAH sarvA mahArAja viprajagmur yathAgatam
text.ur: prajāḥ sarvā mahārāja viprajagmur yathāgatam

text.ascii: tridazA viSNunA sArdham upajagmuH pitAmaham
text.ur: tridaśā viṣṇunā sārdham upajagmuḥ pitāmaham

text.ascii: pUraNArthaM samudrasya mantrayitvA punaH punaH
text.ur: pūraṇārthaṁ samudrasya mantrayitvā punaḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: UcuH prAJjalayaH sarve sAgarasyAbhipUraNam
text.ur: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sāgarasyābhipūraṇam
